name: Sahibinden.com
overview:
sahibinden.com is today the largest online classifieds and e-commerce platform in Turkey with more than 20 million monthly unique visitors and 1.5+ billion monthly pageviews. Apart from being one of the largest, sahibinden.com is also the fastest growing Internet company in Turkey. (Deloitte Fast 50, 2010)

Dedicated to the “free membership, free posting” business model, sahibinden.com has also established one of the biggest online classifieds & marketplace businesses in Europe. As of December 2010, sahibinden.com is the 4th largest vehicle and 5th largest real estate website in Europe according to Google AdPlanner.

Founded by the chairman of Aksoy Group, Taner Aksoy, in the year 2000 with 2.700 ads in 6 main categories, sahibinden.com now offers over 2 mio ads in 100+ categories including cars, real estate, shopping, services, jobs, pets, etc.

Some fast facts about sahibinden.com:
